content.raw:
I have updated the folder structure according to @{557058:67759e29-d1df-465f-868d-047738e36fc9} 's suggestion, but have not updated the `CMakeLists.txt` files. I’m thinking about open a new PR focusing on updating all `CMakeLists.txt` files, then open two PRs of `lib` and `plugin` branching off the `CMakeLists.txt` PR. Eventually, this PR \(#124\) will be closed and only serve record-keeping purpose.

All PRs will be merged in the following order:

\[Updated\]

PR1. base branch: `ign-physics2`

* `tpe_cmakelists_citadel` → `ign-physics2`
* PR: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/125](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/125)
* branch: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe\_cmakelists\_citadel?dest=ign-physics2#diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe_cmakelists_citadel?dest=ign-physics2#diff)

PR2. base branch: `tpe_cmakelists_citadel`

* `tpe_lib_citadel` → `ign-physics2`
* PR: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/126](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/126/citadel-tpe-lib)
* branch: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe\_lib\_citadel?dest=tpe\_cmakelists\_citadel#diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe_lib_citadel?dest=tpe_cmakelists_citadel#diff)

PR3. base branch: `tpe_lib_citadel`

* `tpe_plugin_citadel` → `ign-physics2`
* PR: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/129/citadel-tpe-plugin](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/129/citadel-tpe-plugin)
* branch: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe\_plugin\_citadel?dest=ign-physics2](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe_plugin_citadel?dest=ign-physics2)

‌
content.html:
I have updated the folder structure according to @Michael Grey 's suggestion, but have not updated the CMakeLists.txt files. I’m thinking about open a new PR focusing on updating all CMakeLists.txt files, then open two PRs of lib and plugin branching off the CMakeLists.txt PR. Eventually, this PR (#124) will be closed and only serve record-keeping purpose.

All PRs will be merged in the following order:

[Updated]

PR1. base branch: ign-physics2

  • tpe_cmakelists_citadel → ign-physics2
  • PR: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/125
  • branch: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe_cmakelists_citadel?dest=ign-physics2#diff

PR2. base branch: tpe_cmakelists_citadel

  • tpe_lib_citadel → ign-physics2
  • PR: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/126
  • branch: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe_lib_citadel?dest=tpe_cmakelists_citadel#diff

PR3. base branch: tpe_lib_citadel

  • tpe_plugin_citadel → ign-physics2
  • PR: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/129/citadel-tpe-plugin
  • branch: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/branch/tpe_plugin_citadel?dest=ign-physics2
